answers.answer: Hi,Thanks for writing in.There can be many reasons for your symptoms and exact cause can be identified only after clinical exam and tests.It is important to rule out allergies, peripheral neuropathies due to diabetes and Vitamin deficiencies, stress, anxiety, and fibromyalgia.I would suggest you to do some self relaxation exercises every day and take OTC B complex supplements. In the meantime schedule an appointment with your physician.
